column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in order.
column3: Karen can't stay for the whole meeting. She {{c1::has}} {{c1::to}} {{c1::leave}} {{c1::early}} (leave / to / early / has).

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in order.
column3: I'll take care of everything. You {{c1::don't}} {{c1::have}} {{c1::to}} {{c1::do}} {{c1::anything}} (do / have / anything / don't / to).

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in order.

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in order.
column3:

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in order.

column2: Complete the sentences. Put the words in order.
